page.description: DisableSecurityApplication sets the status of a security application to be disabled. Any a scheduled deployment referencing the security application will effectively be disabled and stopped as well.

argument.name: SecurityApplicationName
argument.description: The name of the security application to be disabled.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
